text: This is a list of post towns in the United Kingdom and Crown dependencies, sorted by the postcode area (the first part of the outward code of a postcode). For more information, see the post town article. Postcode area Post towns AB Aberdeen, Aberlour, Aboyne, Alford (Aberdeenshire),Not to be confused with Alford, Lincolnshire (LN).
